entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:35 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 09:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 08:20 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 08:20 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 08:20 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
